steps.name: Try create user with short login and mail
Write the value 'qqq' in the field <InputFields.username: ('id', 'username')>
Write the value 'a@a.aa' in the field <InputFields.email: ('id', 'email')>
Write the value '4J*6!xUsZe' in the field <InputFields.password: ('id', 'password')>
Write the value '4J*6!xUsZe' in the field <InputFields.repeat_password: ('id', 'confirm')>
